overview: Two blonde sex goddesses, Cicciolina and Moana Pozzi, star in this classic porn movie about the so-called "House of Pleasures". The incomparable Cicciolina's perfomance in anal, group and DP scenes is beyond praise. Ron Jeremy and Eric Price play the regulars of the House of Pleasures, who go through a lot of sexy adventures with the lustful and insatiable girls.
title: Passionate Lovers
